text.0: when we have pressed the juice we laud thee indra and when most valorous we have won the booty.
text.1: bring us prosperity as each desires it under thine own protection may we conquer.
text.2: sublime from birth mayst thou o indra hero with sūrya overcome the dāsa races.
text.3: as by a fountains side we bring the soma that lay concealed closehidden in the waters.
text.4: answer the votarys hymns for these thou knowest craving the Ṛṣis prayer thyself a singer.
text.5: may we be they who take delight in somas these with sweet food for thee o chariotrider.
text.6: these holy prayers o indra have i sung thee grant to the men the strength of men thou hero.
text.7: be of one mind with those in whom thou joyest keep thou the singers safe and their companions.
text.8: listen to pṛthis call heroic indra and be thou lauded by the hymns of venya.
text.9: him who hath sung thee to thine oilrich dwelling whose rolling songs have sped thee like a torrent.
